game.name: ZahmahreL - Chapter 1
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 초자연적 현상을 조사하는 유튜버로서, 버려진 장소에서 일어나는 신비롭고 소름 끼치는 사건들을 탐험하세요. 카메라만이 당신의 유일한 동료입니다. 이 어두운 비밀들을 밝혀낼 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: As a YouTuber investigating supernatural events, explore the mysterious and terrifying happenings in an abandoned location. Your camera is your only ally, but can you uncover these dark secrets?

reviewHighlights.text: This is one of the worst horror games I have ever played. Filled with bugs, and definitely not scary. The character models are horrible looking too.
Zahmarel was actually really solid—and yes, I liked this one. First off, the gameplay deserves credit because it’s not just a walking simulator. You’r...
